alert.note: Alert for Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 3:08PM PST until February 26 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 1 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Snow level will rise to 800 to 1000 feet after 10 am Sunday. * WHERE...Upper Hood River Valley. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 1 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
